khosla.shapes

Class Shape2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • khosla.shapes.Shape
      • khosla.shapes.Shape2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Rectangle

    public abstract class Shape2D
extends Shape
    This class represents a 2D Shape object, meaning a shape that has width, height, and color.
    Version:
    September 28th, 2017.
    Author:
    mkhosla770

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shape2D(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a shape with coordinates at x, y, a width of width, a height of height, a stroke color of black, and a fill color of white.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shape2D

        public Shape2D(double x,
               double y,
               double width,
               double height)
        Creates a shape with coordinates at x, y, a width of width, a height of height, a stroke color of black, and a fill color of white. The colors are each stored as three different doubles: r, g, and b.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the shape.
        y - The y-coordinate of the shape.
        width - The width of the shape.
        height - The height of the shape.

    • Method Detail

      • setColor

        public void setColor(double strokeR,
                     double strokeG,
                     double strokeB,
                     double fillR,
                     double fillG,
                     double fillB)
        Sets both the fill color and stroke color of the shape.
        Parameters:
        strokeR - The R value of the stroke color's RGB.
        strokeG - The G value of the stroke color's RGB.
        strokeB - The R value of the stroke color's RGB.
        fillR - The r value of the fill color's RGB.
        fillG - The G value of the fill color's RGB.
        fillB - The B value of the fill color's RGB.
